articles.title: 'I learned languages and travelled Europe through Erasmus' - BBC
articles.description: Several years after it was scrapped, the UK is now set to rejoin the Erasmus scheme in 2027.
articles.content:
Claire ThomsonBBC Scotland
The Erasmus and Turing schemes meant I could travel around Germany and France
Living abroad while at university allowed me to become almost fluent in two other languages … [+5184 chars]
